Welcome to findhrAPI's documentation!
=====================================


The findhrAPI is a package developed for the
`Fairness and Intersectional Non-Discrimination in Human Recommendation (FINDHR) <http://findhr.eu>`_ project, funded by the European Union.
Check out the :doc:`usage` section for further information, including how to :ref:`install <Installation>` the project.

    :maxdepth: 1
    :caption: Contents:
